1 a.definition: a place in which stores of wealth are kept

sub_terms.b: the place of deposit and disbursement of collected fundsone where public revenues are deposited, kept, and disbursed
sub_terms.c: funds kept in such a depository

sub_terms.a: a governmental department in charge of finances and esp. the collection, management, and expenditure of public revenues
sub_terms.b: the building in which the business of such a governmental department is transacted

3.definition: a government security (as a note or bill) issued by the Treasury
